name: Walden Emergency Hotline
description:
The citizens of Walden can get themselves into some odd situations...

Why call the police or the hospital when Walden Emergency Hotline offers a better alternative? But it's going to be a rough night - because all of their emergency vehicles are out of commission.

As a phone operator, use nothing but your voice to help the citizens of Walden (and your company) to survive a night without the assistance of emergency vehicles.

-About the game-

This is our third game jam. We wanted to try two new things for this jam - A fully voice-acted game, and Comedy.

As with every jam, we would've loved to put more content in the game. Some of our less-funny content made it in, and some of our more-funny content didn't. And of course, much of it was rushed!

You'll find a fair share of typos and mistakes, including our broken and unfinished testing phone call that we decided to include last-minute for more content (definitely a poor choice!).

But we're proud of what we got done, and hopefully you can have a few laughs in this non-typical experience!
